title: MS41006: Biomaterials - Quick Facts

Course name | Biomaterials

Previous Year Grade Distribution

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Introduction to biomaterials, Structure and properties (mechanical, thermal, and surface) of biomaterials: metals and alloys, composites, ceramic materials, polymeric materials, Biocompatibility and blood compatibility, Biomaterials: its foreign body response in a body, Characterization: mechanical and thermal, Biological interface, interaction with biomaterials and adhesion, Biological response to implants, 2D
